name: GeographyGame
0:
”Alexa, open geography game”
”Alexa, start geography game”
”Alexa, launch geography game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: geography game
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Geography Game is an Alexa skill designed to test and expand your geography knowledge!

🌍 Single Player Mode 🌍

• Answer geography-related questions with a simple "yes" or "no."
• Earn points: Each correct answer gives you 1 point.
• Check your score: You can ask for your score at any time by saying "stop."
• After every 10 questions, your total score will be announced.

🌍 Multiplayer Mode 🌍

• Play with your friends or family! Now you can enjoy multiplayer mode with up to 4 players.
• Every 20 questions, the players' scores will be revealed to see who knows the most about geography!
• Now with the new update alexa whenever you get the question wrong will give an explanation of the correct question.
• We also added the Repeat intent so when you don't understand a question you can say “repeat” and Alexa will repeat it for you.


Try multiplayer mode now and see who among your friends or family is the ultimate history expert!


• To create a Routine in the Alexa app on your mobile device •

1. Go to the menu and select Routines.
2. Select the + icon in the top right corner.
3. Select When This Happens, and then choose how to trigger the Routine.
4. Select Add Skill, and then choose which game you want to play.
5. Under From, select which device controls the routine.
6. Tap Create.

🌍 Challenge yourself with exciting new questions from these categories and find out who’s the geography master! 🌍
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
